    • addToken

      public void addToken(String name)
      Adds a new token with the given name, enabled by default.

      The call to this method has no effect if the given name is null or empty, or a token with the given name already exist.

      Parameters:
      name - the name of the token that will be added

    • removeToken

      public void removeToken(String name)
      Removes the token with the given name.

      The call to this method has no effect if the given name is null or empty, or a token with the given name does not exist.

      Parameters:
      name - the name of the token that will be removed
